buwa wage jathiwadayenma me prashne diha balanna epa.mama kiwwe halal nawaththuwoth rate aarthikayata balapana andama gana witharayi.hiru oya kiyana dewal walata ganna puluwan kriya margayak widiyata krama thiyenawa.halal sandaha yam nithi regulasi apitath danna puluwan.halal ganna puluwan dewal sima sahitha karanna puluwan prayogika washayen.ehema hithala balanna misak jathiwadayen wiyaru watichcha pissu ballo ekka ekanga wenna epa.

koti tha්rasthawadaya sahamulinma paradawima me wasara thula aniwaryenma kala yuthu karyayaki.satan peramuna thula menma mathawadi peramuna thula da tha්rasthawadaya mulinuputa damimata merata deshamamaka janathawa me mohothedi pera nowu wiru dhairyayakin, shakthiyakin perata aa yuthuya.koti tha්rasthawadaya sahamulin paradawimen pasu elambaenne aarthikamaya, samaja deshapalanamaya ha sanskruthikamaya washayen jathiya nanga situwana nawa punaruda yugayak kara deshaya ragena yame awashyathawayi.

parlimenthuwedi mema panath ketumpathata sahaya nodakwana bawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaye maithri hithawath parshawaya danatamath prakasha kara awasanya.udgathawa thibena thaththwaya hamuwe sanwardhana panath ketumpatha sampurnayen iwath kara ganenu athida, eseth nathinam ehi sadahan athishayin aandolanathmaka karunu sanshodhanaya kara nawatha idiripath karenu athida yanna gataluwaki.
me pilibada honda adhyanayak kara lipiye sanshodhana karanna.
ema wagakima itu kirima sandaha owunta balakara sitima siwil samajaye wagakima we.
ema pradarshanaya wenuwen kisidu wisheshana namayak yoda noganna athara eya nam karanu labanne 'drushya kala pradarshanaya' yana prawarga namayak hatiyata pamanaki.
thama thanathuruwala diwurum dena wita owun dan kiyawiya yuththe aluth prakashayaki.

me athara habaraduwa - dikkumbaura margaye habaraduwa pradeshaye di siduwu riya anathurakin dariyak miyagos thibe.
ath bagaya genawe nathi moda kama kiyala therune eka athakin kudeyi anith athin pars ekayi allagena thummunin wakkerena dadiya piha ganna widiyak nathi weddiyi...
sini magin mema seratonin mattma ihala nanwana athara shariraye kriyakaribawa wadikirimata hethuwe.
amathyawaraya muhudu werale sita sharirika wyayama sidukarana awasthawedi ohuge madhya lekamwaraya wisin mema widiyowa labagena thibenawa.
yuwalak ekineka sandaha kalaya soya gatha kala yuthu athara owunge wiwahaya saha owunge sambandhathawaya pilibandawa awadhanaya yomu kala yuthuya.
“maithripala sirisena janadhipathithumage rajaya tharam krushikarmanthaya nisa gowi janathawata sahana labadunna wenath kisidu rajayak ape rate ithihasaya thula thibi naha.”
